concept.title: Authorization for full administrators
concept.shortdesc: There are two types of full administrators in Couchbase: the built-in full administrators and the full LDAP administrators.

dlentry.dd: The initial built-in full Couchbase administrator authenticated during Couchbase Server installation has the full access and privileges to manage all Couchbase Server functions. There is one full administrator per Couchbase Server and his user ID is mapped from the LDAP server using the Couchbase Web Console, as explained in .

The full LDAP administrators are set up only when then LDAP authentication is enabled for Couchbase Server. There can be multiple LDAP administrators per Couchbase Server and they are set using the Couchbase Web Console.
